title: ABD Passage Record Schema v0.1
description: Schema for a single passage record in passages.jsonl. Each passage is a contiguous page range assigned as one unit of work for Stage 3 (Atomization) and Stage 4 (Excerpting). One record per line in the JSONL file.

passage_id.description: Sequential passage identifier within the book. Format: P001, P002, etc.

division_ids.description: IDs of the leaf division(s) that this passage covers. Usually one division; multiple if tiny siblings were merged.

title.description: Human-readable title for the passage. Derived from the primary division's title.

heading_path.description: Ancestor division titles from root to this passage's division, for context. E.g. ['الباب الأول: في الفعل', 'التقسيم الأوَّل: إلى ماضٍ ومضارع وأمر', 'الباب الأول: فَعَلَ يَفعُل'].

start_seq_index.description: seq_index of the first page (inclusive). Machine-authoritative page reference.

page_hint_start.description: Human-readable start page, e.g. 'ص:١٩'. Display only.

volume.description: Volume number if the book is multi-volume. null for single-volume books. If a passage spans volumes (should not happen), this is the starting volume.

digestible.description: Always true for passages (non-digestible divisions are skipped, not passaged).

content_type.description: Content classification. 'teaching' = explanatory content. 'exercise' = practice problems. 'mixed' = both in merged passage.

sizing_action.description: 'none' = standard-sized passage. 'merged' = multiple small divisions were merged. 'split' = a large division was split (see split_info). 'flagged_long' = passage is >20 pages but not split (human may review).

sizing_notes.description: Explanation of sizing action if any. null if sizing_action is 'none'.

split_info.description: Present only if sizing_action is 'split'. Describes the split.

split_method.description: How the split point was determined.

merge_info.description: Present only if sizing_action is 'merged'. Describes what was merged.

merged_division_ids.description: IDs of the divisions that were merged into this passage.

merge_reason.description: Why these divisions were merged (e.g. 'adjacent siblings under 1 page each').

science_id.description: Science classification for this passage. Inherited from the book's primary_science unless the book is multi_science, in which case it is per-section.

predecessor_passage_id.description: ID of the preceding passage in document order. null for the first passage.

successor_passage_id.description: ID of the following passage in document order. null for the last passage.
